name: Under the sea (itch) (Imagineee)
description:
Welcome to 'Under the sea', an adventure under the sea, where you were on a diving expedition under the sea when you loose power and fall to the sea bed where you must collaborate with a strange creature to get back to the surface, explore the many underwater wonders, with stunning visuals and and a lot of story lines.

This game was made for the Wowie 4.0 Game Jam where the theme was: 'Collaborate with AI', I took this in a more subtle way with puzzles and navigation mixed in with a bunch of conversation between the player and the AI.

Controls

It is recommended to use a controller

Touch controls also available
